entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Rom√©o LeBlanc Int'l Airport 7:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 43 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow and freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening. Rain along parts of the coast overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
